marklogic.body: And there are still some people defending Zimmerman after seeing this video!!! Unbelievable! Unbelievable! He was savagely attacked by Trayvon they said. Trayvon broke his nose with one punch, banged his head into the sidewalk repeatedly they said. Zimmerman was desperately fighting for his life! He was Bleeding profusely! Look at Zimmerman in the video. Look at him and tell me he looks like a guys that been in a fight!! He has absolutely no blood on him. His clothes are intact! Have you ever seen a fight?? In a fight a shirt Always gets ripped, you don't get out of a fight with intact clothes!! it's not possible. If Zimmerman was in a fight at least his shirt would be slightly stretched, a little bit ripped. He would have contusion on his face. Nothing. No scares, no bruises, no scratches, no ripped clothes, no blood. Are you kidding me !! Zimmerman his a liar and a racist. This confirms it once more, and this time without a doubt.
